ResearchProjectDef.label: M&Co.: energy pack
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Experiment with the fix batteries to develop a mobile power supply.
- Develop an energy pack. It is used to power mobile devices.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered:
You have developped a new battery type that can be moved as an energy pack once fully loaded.
- You can now make energy packs. - Energy pack must be linked to your power net to charge up. They will be usable once fully loaded.

ResearchProjectDef.label: M&Co.: integrated circuits
ResearchProjectDef.description:
After eletrocuting himself while trying to repair a short-circuited battery under rain, one of your colonist had the idea to develop an electronic protection module.
- Develop some electronic components to produce integrated electronics board.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered:
Your researchers have developped several basic eletronic components. Combined together by a crafty man, they will form integrated circuits boards.
- You can now build an electronic workbench. - You can now make integrated circuits boards at the electronic workbench.
